General.Name: DP Poland Plc
General.Description: DP Poland Plc develops, operates, and sub-franchises Domino's Pizza stores in Poland. The company operates through two segments: Corporate Store Sales and Commissary Operations. It operates pizza delivery and dine-in restaurants. DP Poland Plc was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Warsaw, Poland.

2.Name: Mr. Piotr  Dzierzek
2.Title: Deputy Chief Exec. Officer of DP Polska S.A. and Dominium S.A.
